In the fortress, Rat Trap knew it was time to move, and he spots another cr=
awl space off to his left.  It was as small as the one he and Windlord were=
 in now.  He quietly nudges Windlord, and points in the direction of the ne=
w crawl space.  Now, he had to move quickly and quietly, like  a rat.  Rats=
 were good at surviving anything, simply by scurrying off at the hint of da=
nger.  He gives Windlord his tail due to the darkness of the tunnel.

" Win=
dlord, take my tail, it's gonna get a little dark down here.  If there's on=
e thing I'm good at, it's ben' a rat.  Danger comes lookn' for ya, ya move =
your tail'n get outa the way.  Hmm, now I gotta find another wire ta see if=
 I can cut these backup lights..  Aw well, maybe if I just nibble a few mor=
e along the way, I'll get somewhere."

Outside on the battle field, Tucson =
was not about to give up the fight, no matter how adverse it appeared!  Not=
 even the shots that were striking his armor, have little effect to daunt t=
he mighty Autobot leader from his quest.  To protect his comrades, and put =
Hydras and Cyclonus in their places, to assert the fact that he was not goi=
ng to be easilly toppled by any means!  He knew that his comrades needed hi=
s kind of courage if they were to get through this attack.  His optics narr=
ow.  He had had enough of the adversity he and his comrades were forced to =
endure.  While he was preparing to put up a fight of a lifetime, it was as =
if something inside him knew that at this moment, he would need something t=
hat he had been without for many vorns.  

By instinct, he blinks his optic=
s once, and almost immediately, darkness gives way to blurred images which =
quickly focus into precise clarity.  It was the same power that had given h=
im sight before, in order to rescue Rodimus.  He could now see Hydras and h=
is eyes narrow even further.

"So, this is your game is it?  Relying on eve=
ryone else to fight your battles for you..  It's exactly what's happening H=
ydras, You threaten to take me down, but I have yet to see you do that.  Bu=
t unlike yourself, I am NOT afraid to fight my battles.  Courage can never =
be stopped, and it takes courage to fight against your greatest fears!"

Tu=
cson's statement gets to Night Shift.  

" That's it, we can't give up we g=
otta stand our ground!  We're Autobots'n Maximals!  We're not weaklings!   =
And I know just where ta start!  YO KUP, TALON, WE GOTTA GET TAGETHER'N CLI=
P PHOBIA'S WINGS!  IF WE DO THAT WE GOT A CHANCE!"

He wasn't about to put =
up with any more scrap from the Predacons or Decepticons himself. This furt=
her excites Straight Shot who now comes alive off of her recharging dock.

=
"Did I hear someone say they need a plane's wings clipped!?  COUNT ME IN!"
=

She's quick to find Kup again, and transforms into her cross bow mode.

" =
No fear inflicting witch is is gonna tamper with my comrades! Okay, Kup, I'=
m gonna give ya full interface with my long range systems.  You'n I are gon=
na link up, track Phobia, and hopefully stop her before she does anymore da=
mage."

Tucson overhears and looks over to Kup and Straight Shot quickly.

=
"Ahh, glad to see you two linked up.  All right, this is it, we can not let=
 fear consume us!  Talon, Night Shift, link up with Kup and Straight Shot, =
and see what you can do about knocking some predacons and seekers out of th=
e sky.  I'll handle Hydras and the others."

Without knowing what he was do=
ing, Tucson was reaching out to his fellow Autobots and Maximals in a spiri=
tual sense.  One that started with Night Shift, as he could sense the type =
of positive energy that his leader was sending out.  It's at this time wher=
e his Autobot insignia begins to glow a bright blue.  As was the one on Tuc=
son's armor, and on Straight Shot's armor as well.  Night Shift takes a mom=
ent to sense the feeling.

" Heeey, feel that guys?  Because I sure do."

S=
traight Shot senses it also.

"Definitely do, it's like I'm all excited and=
 super determined ta do whatever it takes ta win this fight.  It's like not=
hing I've ever felt before.  Kup, if I can feel it I betchya you can too.  =
It's like an energy going out to each and every one of us... I hope Rodimus=
 feels it too, because this might just be what we need."

Night Shift looks=
 to Talon, who seemed in despair.

" Hey, don't look so down, you're still =
out here puttn' up a great fight, and if that ain't courage, I dunno what i=
s.  That's what ya need, you can beat Phobia's attack, you can do this, ya =
gotta believe that ya can!"

Back at the Ark, Quickstride heard the doors l=
ock. He knew exactly what that meant.

"Uhh ohh, locked out, not good.  But=
 I can't just fall apart when they need me, not now.  If anything, this is =
where I gotta step up ta the plate 'n show those preds and cons what it tru=
ely means ta be a Maximal!  HEAR THAT?!  STUFF THAT IN YOUR AFTERBURNERS'N =
SMOKE IT! JUST WAIT TILL YA FLY OVER HERE, I'M GONNA GROUND YOUR UGLY AFTS =
FOR GOOD!"  

There it was, an energy he had never felt before. It was real=
, as his Maximal insignia glows a bright blue. He looks over to his insigni=
a.

" Heeey, I've seen this happen before...  When we were rescuing Rodimus=
..  I'll be, Tucson was right, we do have something those preds'n cons don'=
t have.  And it's a power that's so simple, yet, more powerful than anythin=
g else in the universe.  And it can only be found in our - in our hearts.  =
And the way Rodimus rushed off, I bet he's feeln' this power right now hims=
elf."

out, Deepstryke hovers in the air in cannon

ters. Occasionally his cannon rips loose with

ead of her special shells she

Bruticus-X, Iguanus and Inferno who were the nearest

to help their commander.

boosters holding him in the air
> as he opened up on Tuscon with a spray of=
 bullets! At the same time
> Insecticon, Bruticus and Iguanus landed on the=

> were ready to begin grappling with the Tuscon.=

> The Fuzors: Skyshadow, Injector, Buzzclaw, Terrorgator, and Quickstri=

> quickly make their power felt on Kup, Talon, Nightshift!
> 
> "Quickst=
rike! TERRORIZE!" Quickstrike screams in glee as he transformed into
> his =
 scorpion/snake mode and landed on the ground! "YEEEHAAW!" He belowed as
> =
he began crawling towards Kup.
> 
> At the same time Buzzclaw and Terrogato=
r went after Talon and Nightshift
> chuckling.
> 
> Skyshadow merely laughe=
d as he stood with his arms folded, "This will be
> over very soon Maximals=
." He said evilly. "If you stand still it will be
> quicker."
> 
> From ove=
rhead Terrorsaur and Waspinator watched, the sweeps pulling in

m, all of them having their guns trained on those below.
>

d stalwart as the Autobots and Maximals are it is obvious that

EAVILY outnumbered, each person having to fight two if not more!!
